reviewText:
My 6 yr old daughter loves this!
She doesn't really watch Hannah Montana but definitely knows who she is. So she enjoyed dancing along to this DVD & feeling like a rock star!

This was a big hit for the 6 yr. old that received it for her birthday.  She loves Hannah Montana and was dancing as soon as the music started.  Have not seen any other DVDs of this kind so it was a great find!  Her mom has even stated she will dance along with her daughter to the dance instructions and get in some
exercise with it!

Thanks for offering this product!
